name: Washerwoman
ability: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Townsfolk.
firstNightReminder: Show the character token of a Townsfolk in play. Point to two players, one of which is that character.
ability_cn: 遊戲開始時，你會得知兩名玩家之中，有一人是指定的鎮民角色。
firstNightReminder_cn: 提示場上某位鎮民的角色後，指向兩名玩家，其中一人為該角色。

name: Librarian
ability: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Outsider. (Or that zero are in play.)
firstNightReminder: Show the character token of an Outsider in play. Point to two players, one of which is that character.
ability_cn: 遊戲開始時，你會得知兩名玩家之中，有一人是指定的外來者。（或場上沒有外來者。）
firstNightReminder_cn: 提示場上某位外來者的角色後，指向兩名玩家，其中一人為該角色。

name: Investigator
ability: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Minion.
firstNightReminder: Show the character token of a Minion in play. Point to two players, one of which is that character.
ability_cn: 遊戲開始時，你會得知兩名玩家之中，有一人是指定的爪牙。
firstNightReminder_cn: 提示場上某位爪牙的角色後，指向兩名玩家，其中一人為該角色。

name: Chef
ability: You start knowing how many pairs of evil players there are.
firstNightReminder: Show the Chef a number equal to the number of pairs of neighbouring evil players.
ability_cn: 遊戲開始時，你會得知有多少組相鄰且存活的邪惡玩家。
firstNightReminder_cn: 告知廚師相鄰且存活的邪惡玩家組合數量。

name: Empath
ability: Each night, you learn how many of your 2 alive neighbours are evil.
firstNightReminder: Show the Empath a number (0, 1, or 2) equal to the number of alive evil neighbours.
otherNightReminder: Show the Empath a number (0, 1, or 2) equal to the number of alive evil neighbours.
ability_cn: 每晚，你會得知你左右兩側相鄰且存活的玩家中，有幾位是邪惡陣營。
firstNightReminder_cn: 告知共情者左右相鄰且存活的玩家中邪惡玩家的數量（0、1 或 2）。
otherNightReminder_cn: 告知共情者左右相鄰且存活的玩家中邪惡玩家的數量（0、1 或 2）。

name: Fortune Teller
ability: Each night, choose 2 players: you learn if either is a Demon. There is a good player that registers as a Demon to you.
firstNightReminder: The Fortune Teller points to two players. Give the head signal (nod yes, shake no) for whether one of those players is the Demon.
otherNightReminder: The Fortune Teller points to two players. Show the head signal (nod 'yes', shake 'no') for whether one of those players is the Demon.
ability_cn: 每晚，選擇兩名玩家：你會得知他們當中是否會有惡魔。而場上會有一名好人始終被你誤認為惡魔。
firstNightReminder_cn: 占卜師指向兩名玩家，以點頭或搖頭表示其中是否有惡魔。
otherNightReminder_cn: 占卜師指向兩名玩家，以點頭（是）或搖頭（否）表示其中是否有惡魔。

name: Undertaker
ability: Each night*, you learn which character died by execution today.
otherNightReminder: If a player was executed today, show that character token to the Undertaker.
ability_cn: 每晚，你會得知今天被處刑玩家的角色。
otherNightReminder_cn: 若今日有玩家被處刑，向送葬者提示該玩家的角色。

name: Monk
ability: Each night*, choose a player (not yourself): they are safe from the Demon tonight.
otherNightReminder: The Monk points to a player. That player is safe from the Demon tonight.
ability_cn: 每晚，選擇一名玩家（不能是自己）：今晚惡魔的攻擊對該玩家無效。
otherNightReminder_cn: 僧侶指向一名玩家。今晚惡魔的攻擊對該玩家無效。

name: Ravenkeeper
ability: If you die at night, you are woken to choose a player: you learn their character.
otherNightReminder: If the Ravenkeeper died tonight, the Ravenkeeper points to a player. Show that character token.
ability_cn: 若你在夜晚死亡，你會被喚醒並選擇一名玩家：你會得知其角色。
otherNightReminder_cn: 若守鴉人今晚死亡，喚醒守鴉人使其指向一名玩家，並提示該玩家的角色。

name: Virgin
ability: The 1st time you are nominated, if the nominator is a Townsfolk, they are executed immediately.
ability_cn: 你第一次被提名時，若提名你的人是鎮民，則其立即被處刑。

name: Slayer
ability: Once per game, during the day, publicly choose a player: if they are the Demon, they die.
ability_cn: 每局限使用一次，在白天你可公開指定一名玩家：若其為惡魔，則其死亡。

name: Soldier
ability: You are safe from the Demon.
ability_cn: 惡魔的攻擊對你無效。

name: Mayor
ability: If only 3 players live & no execution occurs, your team wins. If you die at night, another player might die instead.
ability_cn: 若只剩 3 名玩家存活，且白天沒人被處決，你的陣營直接獲勝。若你在夜晚即將死亡，可能改由另一名玩家死亡。

name: Butler
ability: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): tomorrow, you may only vote if they are voting too.
firstNightReminder: The Butler points to a player. Mark that player as the Butler's master.
otherNightReminder: The Butler points to a player. Mark that player as the Butler's master.
ability_cn: 每晚，選擇一名玩家（不能是自己）：明天，只有在他也投票時你才能投票。
firstNightReminder_cn: 管家指向一名玩家，將該玩家標記為管家的主人。
otherNightReminder_cn: 管家指向一名玩家，將該玩家標記為管家的主人。

name: Drunk
ability: You do not know you are the Drunk. You think you are a Townsfolk character, but you are not.
ability_cn: 你不知道自己是酒鬼。你以為自己是某位鎮民角色，但其實你不是。

name: Recluse
ability: You might register as evil & as a Minion or Demon, even if dead.
ability_cn: 你可能被視為邪惡，且被視為爪牙或惡魔，即使你已死亡亦然。

name: Saint
ability: If you die by execution, your team loses.
ability_cn: 若你在白天被處決，你的陣營直接落敗。

name: Poisoner
ability: Each night, choose a player: they are poisoned tonight and tomorrow day.
firstNightReminder: The Poisoner points to a player. That player is poisoned.
otherNightReminder: The Poisoner points to a player. That player is poisoned.
ability_cn: 每晚，選擇一名玩家：該玩家今晚以及明天白天中毒。
firstNightReminder_cn: 投毒者指向一名玩家。該玩家中毒。
otherNightReminder_cn: 投毒者指向一名玩家。該玩家中毒。

name: Spy
ability: Each night, you see the Grimoire. You might register as good & as a Townsfolk or Outsider, even if dead.
firstNightReminder: Show the Grimoire to the Spy.
otherNightReminder: Show the Grimoire to the Spy.
ability_cn: 每晚，你可以查看魔典。你可能被視為好人，且被視為鎮民或外來者，即使你已死亡亦然。

name: Scarlet Woman
ability: If there are 5 or more players alive & the Demon dies, you become the Demon. (Travellers don't count.)
otherNightReminder: If the Scarlet Woman became the Demon today, show her the 'You are' card and the Imp token.
ability_cn: 若仍有 5 名或以上玩家存活且惡魔死亡，則換你成為惡魔。（旅行者不算在內。）
otherNightReminder_cn: 若紅唇女郎今日成為惡魔，向她出示「你是」卡牌與小惡魔標記。

name: Baron
ability: There are extra Outsiders in play. [+2 Outsiders]
ability_cn: 場上會有額外的外來者。[+2 外來者]

name: Imp
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If you kill yourself this way, a Minion becomes the Imp.
otherNightReminder: The Imp points to a player. That player dies.
ability_cn: 每晚，選擇一名玩家使其死亡。若你以此方式自殺，一名爪牙將成為新的小惡魔。
otherNightReminder_cn: 小惡魔指向一名玩家。該玩家死亡。
